LanguageData.CrystalloidProduction.label: crystalline reconfiguration
LanguageData.CrystalloidProduction.description: Crystal can be manipulated to take other shapes, greatly expanding its uses.
LanguageData.CrystalloidPower.label: psionic energy tapping
LanguageData.CrystalloidPower.description: Latent psionic fields can be tapped for electrical energy.
LanguageData.ShardWeapons.label: shard weaponry
LanguageData.ShardWeapons.description: Crystalline shard launchers can be crafted to shred unarmored targets
LanguageData.CrystalloidWeaving.label: crystalline weaving
LanguageData.CrystalloidWeaving.description: Drawing out crystal into thin strands allows it to be woven into clothing
LanguageData.CrystalloidProduction2.label: anima mutation
LanguageData.CrystalloidProduction2.description: Crystalline flesh samples can be psionically directed to mutate into Anima Prisms, living crystalline constructs that produce usable crystal. Crystalloids can be used for this purpose, and the implications that their primary resource has roots to their own biology is something most humans find unsettling.
LanguageData.PsionicWeapons.label: psionic weaponry
LanguageData.PsionicWeapons.description: Psionic weapons deal burning damage, which interacts with armor in a different way than bullets do.
LanguageData.CrystalloidConstructs.label: construct basics
LanguageData.CrystalloidConstructs.description: Simple prism constructs can be fabricated and directed by a construct hub to help defend the colony.
LanguageData.CrystalloidConstructs2.label: advanced construct design
LanguageData.CrystalloidConstructs2.description: Preserver constructs can be deployed to bring much more firepower than prisms.
